name: C@B Savior Chrome Extension
description: This extension allows Brown students to easily check classes for available seats, time/location, and title without being logged in to the CAB website. You can also subscribe to classes with an email address, and receive email and push notifications when spaces open up in the course. We are unaffiliated with Brown University, and all code was created by Amos Jackson, Eleanor Avril, Hannah Chow, and Pete Kelly.
